text: obagen kavurun ho (tama) vadana rahasin taba gattada, nætahot eya prasiddhiye pævasuvada, ohuta (e dekama) eka samanaya! (esema obagen vu) kavurun ho ratriyehi taman karana dæya sangava gattada, nætahot dahavalehi prasiddhiye kala vuvada, (ohuta eya eka samanaya! siyallange kriyavanma ohu hondin danneya)
